Name: open the door slowly.
Text: You opened the door and stepped inside

Name: kick down the door!
Text: You kicked down the door. you stepped inside

Name: Leave room.
Text: You proceed to the entrance hall

Name: Search the closet.
Text: As you open the closet a cloud of moths fly out, a few stinking leather coats hang on frail hooks. You search the pockets and eventually find a KEY. There doesnt seem to be anything else of interest here so you return to the entrance hall

Name: Kneel next to the zombie and listen.
Text: Holding your breath from the stench you step forward.

Name: Ask why he tried to run away.
Text: As you speak to the zombie he suddenly erupts into a terrible growl.

Name: Ask for the ring.
Text: You sternly ask the zombie for the ring.

Name: Search the ashes.
Text: There seems to be something in the zombies remains.

Name: Destroy this creature and relieve him from his torment.
Text: Standing over the mumbling undead, you recite a funeral prayer.

Name: Hold your holy cross firmly before the ghast and recite a banishment prayer!
Stand your ground. There is nothing to fear. God is on your side.
Move towards the iron gate at the far end of the room.
Text: You cross the decaying furniture to towards the gate.

Name: Try the key.
Text: The key fits and the gate opens with a slow heavy groan, the sound of its rusty hinges echos down the stairs. What do you do?

Name: Go down the stairs.
